comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Sets an item stack within a particular slot.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Zero-based index of the slot to set an item at.

comments.name: param
comments.value:
Stack of items to place within the specified slot.
Setting `itemStack` to undefined will clear the slot.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: Throws if the container is invalid or if the `slot` index is out of bounds.
